action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

We're needing a new collection landing page and product pages created/updated for our 'Shapes' collection FOR ALL 3 SITES.

Assets are in this dropbox link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/d2cxlr3ek0c5yzx/AABGtE-HWyef3e6Hoxtt66Axa?dl=0

Will need a Shapes 'collection' page as well as 6 x Product pages for each of the shapes. All available in our full range of colourways.

'Collection' page:

Can we please have the collection page structured similarly to baffles and clouds. Line drawings should be in the dropbox file.
https://acoufelt.com/baffles/
https://acoufelt.com/clouds/

Product pages:

Update name/s to 'Rectangle - Shape', 'Ogee - Shape' etc.

Description (TOP RHS):

The Acoufelt Shapes collection represents a series of shapes made from acoustic FilaSorb™ material, which can be applied as a fun and functional decorative wall feature. Shapes offer flexibility in design through the wide range of tessellation application options.

DETAILS:

The Acoufelt Shapes Collection is available in 6 shapes: Diamond, Ogee, Hexagon, Rectangle, Scale and Right Triangle, and offered across our full range of colours. Acoufelt Shapes achieve a minimum NRC of 0.45, which increases with material thickness, installation, and configuration.

Acoufelt wall shapes are comprised of FilaSorb™, contributing to both the acoustic performance of the panel, as well as the smooth surface finish.

SPECIFICATIONS:

SPECIFICATIONS

Surface

Wall
Composition

100% Polyester
Material

FilaSorb™
Recycled Content

60% min.
NRC Rating

0.45 min.
Thickness

12mm +/- 10% | 0.47" +/- 10%
Dimensions

Fire Tests

AS/ISO 9705: 2003 Group 1, ASTM E84-17a Class A, ISO 9705: 1993 Group 1

FYI - please ensure dimensions on each product page are listed as per the particular shape.

DOWNLOADS: (should be in the dropbox file)

Specification sheet
Installation guide
Care guide

Please let me know if there's anything else you need?

Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager


t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com
